title: The Gothic Tarot
description: Illustrated by acclaimed gothic fantasy artist Joseph Vargo, this unique and exquisite deck contains all 78 cards of the Major and Minor Arcana, conveying a dark and elegant gothic mood with haunting images of vampires, gargoyles, ghosts, and angels. Comes complete with a 24-page instruction booklet providing detailed definitions of each card, and offers an easy-to-use pictorial guide of Tarot spreads with instructions for readings.
author: Joseph Vargo
